import React from"react";import{Container,Table,TableBody,TableCell,TableHead,TableRow}from"@mui/material";import DeleteIcon from"@mui/icons-material/Delete";import Chart from"../containers/Chart";import Total from"../containers/Total";import AddCar from"../containers/AddCar";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Dashboard=function Dashboard(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{maxWidth:"lg",className:"car-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["Welcome, ",props.user.username]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chart,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Total,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddCar,{carTotal:props.cars.length})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableHead,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableRow,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Id"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Make/Model"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"MPG"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Cylinders"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Horsepower"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Delete"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableBody,{children:props.cars.map(function(car,idx){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableRow,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{component:"th",scope:"row",children:car.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:car["name"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:car["mpg"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:car["cylinders"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:car["horsepower"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteIcon// add onClick method here
,{onClick:function onClick(){return props.removeCar(idx);},className:"icon text-red"})})]},car.id);})})]})]});};export default Dashboard;
